article.title: General Atomics Supports Gray Eagle Unmanned Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: General Atomics Aeronautical Systems, Incorporated, Poway, California, was awarded a $30,342,272 cost-plus-incentive-fee contract modification in support of the MQ-1C Gray Eagle unmanned aircraft system quick reaction capability. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
